title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Approaches to Drug Design: Enzyme Inhibition, Molecular Recognition, Receptor Based Molecular Modelling, QSAR, Agonist and Antagonist. Examples of Designed Drugs: Antihypertensive, Antiviral, Anticancer and Antibiotic. Combinatorial Library and Highthrouput Screening.
